imdb.title: Centaur no nayami
imdb.plot: High school is a complicated time for any young centaur, but shy, sweet Himeno won't have to clop through it alone!

episodes.title: Nandakanda de, Minna, Kisu tte Daisuki da yo ne/Marason tte Jinsei no Shukuzu datte, Shitteta?
episodes.plot: It's nearly time for the school fair, and Himeno's class is putting on a play. Himeno is chosen to play the princess, and after much consideration, Nozomi is chosen to play the prince!

episodes.title: Utsukushi-sa tte, Moroha no Yaiba nano deatta/Mizu ni Ikiru Mizu no Hito, Riku ni Ikiru Yama no Hito tte Manma jan.
episodes.plot: Himeno has been featured in a fashion magazine! Could it be that she's working part-time as a model? Suspicion and wild ideas fill the minds of Nozomi and Kyoko, but what is the real story?

episodes.title: Chisana Ko no Ano Baitariti wa Dokokara Kuru no?/Jidai ya Nendai o Towazu, Maho Shojo tte Ninki Aru yo ne.
episodes.plot: Manami has four younger sisters: a set of triplets and an even younger fourth sister. When Manami orders the triplets to stay home and watch their sister, the four youngest Mitama sisters experience a truly mysterious phenomenon.

episodes.title: Rabu Reta o Moratte Konwakusuru... Sono Kokoro wa?/Yufo, Yuma no Tagui o Shinjiru ka Shinjinai ka de, Taipu ga Wakareru yo ne.
episodes.plot: On her way to school one morning, a boy from another school gives Himeno a love letter. The sudden turn of events has Himeno bewildered due to a traumatic memory from her childhood. What happened in Himeno's past?

episodes.title: Nankyokujin tte Uwasa ga Hitori Aruki Shiteru mitai/Demo, Nankyokujin tte Rekishi mo Rutsu mo Nazo da yo ne.
episodes.plot: A new student, the Antarctican Quetzalcoatl Sassassul, transfers into the girls' school, much to the intrigue of everyone in the class. The new student is as friendly as can be, but Himeno just can't shake her fear due to a traumatic childhood experience.

episodes.title: Senzo ya Rekishi no Koto o Sakanoboreru no wa, Mushiro Kofuku? Soretomo Fuko?/Honto ni Suki na Koto o Shigoto ni suru Koto wa Hatashite Shiawase nano ka na?
episodes.plot: Himeno's Centaur ancestors have a romantic, fascinating history of grand proportions. To Himeno, living as she does in the present world, it's a fantastic tale she can't even imagine.

episodes.title: Hajimete no Keiken tte Kyofu to Kyomi ga Kyozon... Raimu dakedo ne./Osanai Koro ni Mita Okaruto Eiga no Kyofu wa Hyaku-yon-ju-Pasento Mashi da yo ne.
episodes.plot: Manami, Himeno, and the rest of the gang are on their way to spend the day at the pool! How will Suu-chan deal with her first pool experience?

episodes.title: Shinken Shobu tte Mentaru no Tsuyosa ga Ichiban no Shoinna no Kamo Shirenai./Shinjiru Mono no Fukakutei satte... Nante Fujori ni Tsubuyaitari shite.
episodes.plot: Himeno is participating in a yabusame competition. A younger girl who trains with her, Ayaka, suddenly approaches her with a declaration of war!

episodes.title: Seken de Ijin tte Iwareteiru Hito no Kuno tte./Seken de Ijin tte Iwareteiru Hito no Jinsei tte.
episodes.plot: Jean Rousseau of the Amphibianfolk has been frequently featured in the media lately. Just what kind of person is he? And the prominent man who has a meeting with Jean Rousseau, what strange past does this man have?

episodes.title: Deto ni Gendai Bijutsu Kansho o Eranda Baai... Sono 1./Deto ni Gendai Bijutsu Kansho o Eranda Baai... Sono 2.
episodes.plot: Suu-chan the Antarctican is going on a date with a boy in her class. Himeno, Nozomi, and Kyoko are worried about her, so they quietly follow the couple.

episodes.title: Hana no Namae wa... ... Hito no Kazu dake Arunda yo, tte Kitto Uso!/Utsukushi-sa wa Hito no Kazu dake Arunda yo, Kogi de Ieba Kitto Honto?
episodes.plot: Sue-chan, the youngest of the Mitama family, has a weak constitution. Manami and her triplet sisters are always worrying about her. Himeno's niece, Shino-chan, is a very curious girl. She asks Himeno all kinds of questions as they go for a walk.

episodes.title: Fantaji o RPG Kibun de Tsukutta Mita./Gekito! Udezumo! Onna (Hiroin) Darake no Shobu no Yukue wa
episodes.plot: As they read a script that Mitsuyo wrote, Kyoko and Nozomi have various criticisms. Just what is Mitsuyo's story about? All the girls in the class are holding an arm wrestling tournament. Who will be the victor?
